Titanic was filmed aboard cruise ship SS Cap Arcona in the Baltic Sea. The movie\u2019s director Herbert Selpin was arrested by the Gestapo over comments he made about the ship\u2019s crew and he was questioned by Goebbels. Selpin was found dead the next day in his cell. The Gestapo\u2019s verdict was suicide. Titanic never received the impressive premiere that Goebbels intended, being first shown in Nazi-occupied Paris in 1943.
